import React from "react"; import { Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import Footer from "./Footer"; const About = () => { return ( <>

About Us

Christ in Action is a kind and helpful organization that assists people during difficult times. They follow Christian beliefs and work to bring hope and support to those facing crises. They have volunteers who are trained and ready to help in different ways. Whether it's responding to natural disasters, emergencies, or personal struggles, Christ in Action wants to provide immediate help and also help people recover in the long run. They offer practical assistance, emotional comfort, and spiritual guidance to show love and bring healing to those in need. Christ in Action aims to be a source of hope and strength when things are tough. {" "}

); }; export default About;
